summary.description:
Class-specific Reconstruction Transfer Learning for Visual Recognition Across Domains.

This is a matlab code for CRTL in ICCV Workshop 2107. We use the matlab R2015b version.

Class-specific Reconstruction Transfer Learning via Sparse Low-rank Constraint on matlab.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'CRTL three-fold', 'Class-specific Reconstruction Transfer Learning', 'Class-specific'
summary.name: CRTL
